title: News24.com | WATCH: Police use water cannons to disperse crowd in Cape Town
description: Police have defended their use of a water cannon to disperse a crowd of people outside a store in Delft, Cape Town on the first day of the 21-day lockdown in the country, aimed at curbing the spread of the novel coronavirus.
content:
Police have defended their use of a water cannon to disperse a crowd of people outside a store in Delft, Cape Town, on Friday – the first day of the 21-day lockdown, aimed at curbing the spread of the novel coronavirus.
